org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api

Interface StatisticQueryBuilder<V extends StatisticValue<R>,R,B extends StatisticQueryBuilder<V,R,B>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - the statistic value type
    R - the return type of the statistic value
    B - the builder type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStatisticQueryBuilder, DataTypeStatisticQueryBuilder, FieldStatisticQueryBuilder, IndexStatisticQueryBuilder

    public interface StatisticQueryBuilder<V extends StatisticValue<R>,R,B extends StatisticQueryBuilder<V,R,B>>
    Base interface for constructing statistic queries.

    • Method Summary

      Set the tag for the query.

    • Method Detail

      • tag

        B tag(String tag)
        Set the tag for the query. Only statistics that match the given tag will be queried.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to use
        Returns:
        this

      • internal

        B internal()
        Set the tag filter to internal statistics. If this is set, only internal statistics willb e queried.
        Returns:
        this

      • addAuthorization

        B addAuthorization(String authorization)
        Add an authorization to the query.
        Parameters:
        authorization - the authorization to add
        Returns:
        this

      • authorizations

        B authorizations(String[] authorizations)
        Set the query authorizations to the given set.
        Parameters:
        authorizations - the authorizations to use
        Returns:
        this

      • binConstraints

        B binConstraints(BinConstraints binConstraints)
        Sets the bins of the query. If a queried statistic uses a binning strategy, only values contained in one of the bins matching BinConstraints will be returned.
        Parameters:
        binConstraints - the binConstraints object to use which will be appropriately interpreted for this query
        Returns:
        this

      • build

        StatisticQuery<V,R> build()
        Build the statistic query.
        Returns:
        the statistic query
